min_length_4: {{property}} must be longer than or equal to 4 characters
max_length_4: {{property}} must be shorter than or equal to 4 characters
is_date_string: {{property}} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
is_matches: {{property}} must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one symbol
is_phone_number: {{property}} must be a valid phone number
episode_id_required: episode_session_id is required when episode_id is provided
min_length_1: {{property}} must be longer than or equal to 1 characters
max_length_7: {{property}} must be shorter than or equal to 7 characters
is_array_max_size: {{property}} must contain not more than 1 elements
lenght_1_to_7: {{property}} Must be greater than equal to 1 and less than equal to 7
